amonSlotStatsTable.name: amonSlotStatsTable
amonSlotStatsTable.description: A list of slot entries. Each entry contains statistical data pertaining to a single slot on the ATM switch. An entry is maintained at all times for each of the slots that exist in the hub. The table is automatically updated for hot-swappable slots that are added to or removed from the switch.

amonSlotStatsEntry.name: amonSlotStatsEntry
amonSlotStatsEntry.description: A collection of statistics for a particular slot. A slot is defined according to the ifIndex of the CPU: ifIndex = Slot*1024 + 1

amonSlotInCells.name: amonSlotInCells
amonSlotInCells.description: The total number of ATM cells (including bad HEC cells and cells dropped by the switch) which were received by the slot.

amonSlotBadHecCells.name: amonSlotBadHecCells
amonSlotBadHecCells.description: The total number of bad HEC cells received by the slot.

amonSlotDroppedCells.name: amonSlotDroppedCells
amonSlotDroppedCells.description: The total number of cells dropped by the slot due to congestion conditions in the switching fabric.

amonSlotUbrCells.name: amonSlotUbrCells
amonSlotUbrCells.description: The total number of good ATM cells received by the slot using the UBR service.

amonSlotAbrCells.name: amonSlotAbrCells
amonSlotAbrCells.description: The total number of good ATM cells received by the slot using the ABR service.

amonSlotNrtVbrCells.name: amonSlotNrtVbrCells
amonSlotNrtVbrCells.description: The total number of good ATM cells received by the slot using the non real-time VBR service.

amonSlotRtVbrCells.name: amonSlotRtVbrCells
amonSlotRtVbrCells.description: The total number of good ATM cells received by the slot using the real-time VBR service.

amonSlotCbrCells.name: amonSlotCbrCells
amonSlotCbrCells.description: The total number of good ATM cells received by the slot using the CBR service.

amonSlotPnniCells.name: amonSlotPnniCells
amonSlotPnniCells.description: The total number of good cells received by the slot on PNNI connections.

amonSlotSignalingCells.name: amonSlotSignalingCells
amonSlotSignalingCells.description: The total number of good cells received by the slot on signalling connections.

amonSlotLaneCells.name: amonSlotLaneCells
amonSlotLaneCells.description: The total number of good LANE cells switched by the switch.

amonSlotLaneDataDirectCells.name: amonSlotLaneDataDirectCells
amonSlotLaneDataDirectCells.description: The total number of good cells received by the switch on LANE data direct connections.

amonSlotLaneMulticastCells.name: amonSlotLaneMulticastCells
amonSlotLaneMulticastCells.description: The total number of good cells received by the switch to LANE BUSes.

amonSlotLaneConfigControlCells.name: amonSlotLaneConfigControlCells
amonSlotLaneConfigControlCells.description: The total number of good cells received by the switch on LANE configuration and control connections.

amonSlotDefinityCells.name: amonSlotDefinityCells
amonSlotDefinityCells.description: The total number of good cells received by the switch on Definity PBX connections.

amonSlotTotalBwAllocated.name: amonSlotTotalBwAllocated
amonSlotTotalBwAllocated.description: The total amount of bandwidth allocated by the switch, in Kbps.

amonSlotAbrBwAllocated.name: amonSlotAbrBwAllocated
amonSlotAbrBwAllocated.description: The total amount of bandwidth allocated by the switch for ABR traffic, in Kbps.

amonSlotNrtVbrBwAllocated.name: amonSlotNrtVbrBwAllocated
amonSlotNrtVbrBwAllocated.description: The total amount of bandwidth allocated by the switch for non real-time VBR traffic, in Kbps.

amonSlotRtVbrBwAllocated.name: amonSlotRtVbrBwAllocated
amonSlotRtVbrBwAllocated.description: The total amount of bandwidth allocated by the switch for real-time VBR traffic, in Kbps.

amonSlotCbrBwAllocated.name: amonSlotCbrBwAllocated
amonSlotCbrBwAllocated.description: The total amount of bandwidth allocated by the switch for CBR traffic, in Kbps.

amonPortStatsTable.name: amonPortStatsTable
amonPortStatsTable.description: A list of port entries. Each entry contains statistical data pertaining to a single physical port on the ATM switch. An entry is maintained at all times for each of the ports that exist in the hub. The table is automatically updated for hot-swappable ports that are added to or removed from the switch.

amonPortStatsEntry.name: amonPortStatsEntry
amonPortStatsEntry.description: A collection of statistics for a particular port. A port is defined according to the ifIndex of the ATM Layer including CPU ifIndex = Slot*1024 + P*2 + 2, CPU: S*1024 + 1

amonPortInCells.name: amonPortInCells
amonPortInCells.description: The number of ATM cells -including bad HEC cells- received by the switch via this port.

amonPortOutCells.name: amonPortOutCells
amonPortOutCells.description: The number of ATM cells -including bad HEC cells- transmitted by the switch via this port.

amonPortInBadHecCells.name: amonPortInBadHecCells
amonPortInBadHecCells.description: The number of bad HEC cells received by the switch through this port.

amonPortInUbrCells.name: amonPortInUbrCells
amonPortInUbrCells.description: The number of good ATM cells received by the switch via this port using the UBR service.

amonPortInAbrCells.name: amonPortInAbrCells
amonPortInAbrCells.description: The number of good ATM cells received by the switch via this port using the ABR service.

amonPortInNrtVbrCells.name: amonPortInNrtVbrCells
amonPortInNrtVbrCells.description: The number of good ATM cells received by the switch via this port using the non real-time VBR service.

amonPortInRtVbrCells.name: amonPortInRtVbrCells
amonPortInRtVbrCells.description: The number of good ATM cells received by the switch via this port using the real-time VBR service.

amonPortInCbrCells.name: amonPortInCbrCells
amonPortInCbrCells.description: The number of good ATM cells received by the switch via this port using the CBR service.

amonPortInPointToPointCells.name: amonPortInPointToPointCells
amonPortInPointToPointCells.description: The number of good ATM cells received by the switch via this port on point to point connections.

amonPortInPointToMultipointCells.name: amonPortInPointToMultipointCells
amonPortInPointToMultipointCells.description: The number of good ATM cells received by the switch via this port on point to multipoint connections.

amonPortInPnniCells.name: amonPortInPnniCells
amonPortInPnniCells.description: The number of good cells received by the switch via this port on connections used for PNNI.

amonPortInSignalingCells.name: amonPortInSignalingCells
amonPortInSignalingCells.description: The number of good cells received by the switch via this port on connections used for signaling.

amonPortInLaneDataDirectCells.name: amonPortInLaneDataDirectCells
amonPortInLaneDataDirectCells.description: The number of good cells received by the switch via this port on LANE data direct connections.

amonPortInLaneMulticastCells.name: amonPortInLaneMulticastCells
amonPortInLaneMulticastCells.description: The number of good cells received by the switch via this port on LANE multicast connections.

amonPortLaneConfigControlCells.name: amonPortLaneConfigControlCells
amonPortLaneConfigControlCells.description: The number of good cells received by the switch via this port on LANE configuration and control connections.

amonPortDefinityCells.name: amonPortDefinityCells
amonPortDefinityCells.description: The number of good cells received by the switch via this port on Definity PBX connections.

amonHostTimeTable.name: amonHostTimeTable
amonHostTimeTable.description: A list of ATM host time entries. Each entry contains statistical data pertaining to a single ATM host communicating via the switch. The table is activated by the RMON hostControlTable. The table is indexed by the RMON MIB's hostTimeIndex (Which will be used as Slot Index) and by amonHostTimeCreationOrder.

amonHostTimeEntry.name: amonHostTimeEntry
amonHostTimeEntry.description: A collection of statistics for a particular ATM host.

amonHostTimeAddress.name: amonHostTimeAddress
amonHostTimeAddress.description: The ATM address of this host.

amonHostTimeIndex.name: amonHostTimeIndex
amonHostTimeIndex.description: The set of collected host statistics of which this entry is a part. The set of hosts identified by a particular value of this index is associated with the hostControlEntry as identified by the same value of hostControlIndex. This is the Slot Number.

amonHostTimeCreationOrder.name: amonHostTimeCreationOrder
amonHostTimeCreationOrder.description: An index that uniquely identifies an entry in the atmHostTime table among those entries associated with the same hostControlEntry. This index shall be between 1 and N, where N is the value of the associated hostControlTableSize. The ordering of the indexes is based on the order of each entry-s insertion into the table, in which entries added earlier have a lower index value than entries added later. Thus the management station has the ability to learn of new entries added to this table without downloading the entire table.

amonHostTimeOutCells.name: amonHostTimeOutCells
amonHostTimeOutCells.description: The number of ATM cells -including bad HEC cells- transmitted by this host via the switch.

amonHostTimeOutUbrCells.name: amonHostTimeOutUbrCells
amonHostTimeOutUbrCells.description: The number of good ATM cells transmitted by the host via the switch using the UBR service.

amonHostTimeOutAbrCells.name: amonHostTimeOutAbrCells
amonHostTimeOutAbrCells.description: The number of good ATM cells transmitted by the host via the switch using the ABR service.

amonHostTimeOutNrtVbrCells.name: amonHostTimeOutNrtVbrCells
amonHostTimeOutNrtVbrCells.description: The number of good ATM cells transmitted by the host via the switch using the non real-time VBR service.

amonHostTimeOutRtVbrCells.name: amonHostTimeOutRtVbrCells
amonHostTimeOutRtVbrCells.description: The number of good ATM cells transmitted by the host via the switch using the real-time VBR service.

amonHostTimeOutCbrCells.name: amonHostTimeOutCbrCells
amonHostTimeOutCbrCells.description: The number of good ATM cells transmitted by the host via the switch using the CBR service.

amonHostTimeOutLaneCells.name: amonHostTimeOutLaneCells
amonHostTimeOutLaneCells.description: The total number of good LANE cells transmitted by this host on VCs handled by the switch.

amonHostTimeOutLaneDataDirectCells.name: amonHostTimeOutLaneDataDirectCells
amonHostTimeOutLaneDataDirectCells.description: The number of good cells transmitted by this host on LANE data direct VCs handled by the switch.

amonHostTimeOutLaneMulticastCells.name: amonHostTimeOutLaneMulticastCells
amonHostTimeOutLaneMulticastCells.description: The number of good cells transmitted by this host on LANE multicast VCs handled by the switch.

amonHostTimeOutLaneConfigControlCells.name: amonHostTimeOutLaneConfigControlCells
amonHostTimeOutLaneConfigControlCells.description: The number of good cells transmitted by this host on LANE configuration and control VCs handled by the switch.

amonHostTimeOutDefinityCells.name: amonHostTimeOutDefinityCells
amonHostTimeOutDefinityCells.description: The number of good cells transmitted by this host on Definity PBX VCs handled by the switch.

amonMatrixTimeTable.name: amonMatrixTimeTable
amonMatrixTimeTable.description: A list of ATM matrix entries (source and destination ATM NSAP address). The table is activated by the RMON matrixControlTable. The table is indexed by the amonMatrixTimeIndex (Which will be used as Slot Index) and by amonMatrixTimeCreationOrder.

amonMatrixTimeEntry.name: amonMatrixTimeEntry
amonMatrixTimeEntry.description: A collection of statistics for communications between two ATM NSAP addresses on the switch. This table is created by the RMON MIB matrix control table.

amonMatrixTimeIndex.name: amonMatrixTimeIndex
amonMatrixTimeIndex.description: The set of collected matrix statistics of which this entry is a part. The set of matrix statistics identified by a particular value of this index is associated with the same matrixControlEntry as identified by the same value of matrixControlIndex. This is the Slot Number.

amonMatrixTimeCreationOrder.name: amonMatrixTimeCreationOrder
amonMatrixTimeCreationOrder.description: An index that uniquely identifies an entry in the amonMatrixTimeTable among those entries associated with the same matrixControlEntry. This index shall be between 1 and N, where N is the value of the associated matrixControlTableSize. The ordering of the indexes is based on the order of each entry-s insertion into the table, in which entries added earlier have a lower index value than entries added later. Thus the management station has the ability to learn of new entries added to this table without downloading the entire table.

amonMatrixTimeCells.name: amonMatrixTimeCells
amonMatrixTimeCells.description: The number of cells transmitted from the source address to the destination address.

amonMatrixTimeUbrCells.name: amonMatrixTimeUbrCells
amonMatrixTimeUbrCells.description: The number of cells transmitted from the source address to the destination address via the switch using the UBR service.

amonMatrixTimeAbrCells.name: amonMatrixTimeAbrCells
amonMatrixTimeAbrCells.description: The number of cells transmitted from the source address to the destination address via the switch using the ABR service.

amonMatrixTimeNrtVbrCells.name: amonMatrixTimeNrtVbrCells
amonMatrixTimeNrtVbrCells.description: The number of cells transmitted from the source address to the destination address via the switch using the non real-Time VBR service.

amonMatrixTimeRtVbrCells.name: amonMatrixTimeRtVbrCells
amonMatrixTimeRtVbrCells.description: The number of cells transmitted from the source address to the destination address via the switch using the real-time VBR service.

amonMatrixTimeCbrCells.name: amonMatrixTimeCbrCells
amonMatrixTimeCbrCells.description: The number of cells transmitted from the source address to the destination address via the switch using the CBR service.
